title: Partner With Us
subtitle: Join our global healthcare network
heading: Partner With Us
intro: Join Panacea Medcare International team and become part of a billion dollar growing industry. We offer partnership opportunities on profit sharing basis with representative offices in your country.

proposition.title: The Proposition
points: Be a part of Panacea Medcare International team
Partners on profit sharing basis
Panacea Medcare representative office in your country

whatYouCanExpect.title: What you can expect from us
points: Top of the line treatment for your patients
State of the art hospitals (JCI/ ISO accredited)
World class, accredited medical expertise
Reasonable costs
Complete peace of mind
Comprehensive coordination of all logistics of the patient; from traveling to accommodations and treatment.
Single point of contact for all our interactions with you and your patients.
24x7 availability for any issue resolution.
Appropriate commissions/ financial remuneration.
We can support you in various India based activities.
We can support/partner for other business Opportunities In Medical field- viz. Supply of Medicines/Equipment or any other

whatWeExpect.title: What we expect from you
points: You help popularize India and Panacea Medcare as a favored destination for world-class medical treatment.
You inform and recommend your patients to us.
You assure patients of world class services from us.
You provide us with medical history, reports and your perspective of the patients and their condition, to facilitate their treatment.
Other details you would think as necessary that we should know at the time of sending the patient for treatment.
If the patient needs ambulance â€“ Road / Air
If the patient needs accommodation post treatment / surgery, what category ?
Details of patients present condition.
You provide inputs on patient feedback on our services.

patient.title: Patient
points: The patient will avail top class treatment from best doctors and world class accredited hospitals.
A single point of contact will provide comprehensive coordination and facilitation to the patient.
We will manage the complete trip so the patient doesn't have to worry about anything.

you.title: You
points: You get to be a part of a billion Dollar growing industry.
You are providing a complete treatment package to your patients at affordable costs.
You will find a trustworthy partner in Panacea Medcare, with an expert team
You will find absolute transparency in our dealings
You will be a share-holder of the profits with us.

panaceaMedcare.title: Panacea Medcare
points: You will help us in building our strong network.
You will help us market our services.
By promoting Panacea Medcare you will help us build our Brand name.
